query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZLET017 ( MANDT, ZBELN, ZOSNR, POSID2, POST1, BDTER, EL_ATYP, EL_ZAFQ, AUFNR, KTEXT, EXTWG, RSNUM, RSPOS, MATNR, MAKTX, ZMTART, ERFMG, ENMNG, PRLAB, ERFME, LGORT, LGOBE, KUNNR, NAME1, WADAT, VSTEL, KUNWE, VKORG, VTWEG, SPART, VBELN, POSNR, ZSTAT1, ZSTAT2, ZSTAT3, ZSTAT4, ZLOG1, ZLOG2, ZLOG3, ERNAM, ERDAT, UZEIT, LZONE, ZCANC, AENAM, LAEDA, CHANGE_TIME ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT#, ' ', ' ', #POSID2#, #POST1#, #BDTER#, #EL_ATYP#, #EL_ZAFQ#, #AUFNR#, #KTEXT#, #EXTWG#, #RSNUM#, #RSPOS#, #MATNR#, #MAKTX#, #ZMTART#, CAST(#ERFMG# AS dec), CAST(#ENMNG# AS dec), CAST(#PRLAB# AS dec), #ERFME#, #LGORT#, #LGOBE#, #KUNNR#, #NAME1#, #WADAT#, #VSTEL#, #KUNWE#, #VKORG#, #VTWEG#, #SPART#, #VBELN#, #POSNR#, #ZSTAT1#, #ZSTAT2#, #ZSTAT3#, #ZSTAT4#, #ZLOG1#, #ZLOG2#, #ZLOG3#, #G_USER_ID#, HEX(CURRENT DATE), HEX(CURRENT TIME), #LZONE#, #ZCANC#, '', '', '' )
